game.name: Car Chaser
game.description:
It is time to enter the biggest car chase, live for long and prove the world that you are blessed with the skills to become a true chaser! Why do not you try out this amazing latest racing game to show your value to this amazing world? It only takes a few clicks to get you participated in highly addictive and engaging Car Chaser. Make sure to move the joystick properly to stay for long in the game. Car is too little, but your craze for driving is intense. 

Do not underestimate your cool driving and escaping abilities in this HTML5 car game. Grab your seat on this mini car, use the joystick properly to steer it and collect coins on the highly challenging cars! Try to grab as much money as you can to upgrade your vehicle and make your gameplay more interesting and engaging! Handle the twist properly to see who long you can survive in this one of the best car games for kids!

Track your score by looking at the top portion of the screen in this police car chase game! The top right corner of the screen will show you how many coins you have grabbed as of now. Apart from escaping from the police cars, also try to keep your vehicle from the white boundaries. A single crash with any police vehicles or white boundaries will make your car blast and you will lose your game! Check out more free police car chase games on atmegame.com for free and have fun alone or with your friends!
